name: @creditkarma/dynamic-config
description: Dynamic Config for Node.js backed by Consul and Vault

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run lint && tsc
scripts.copy-test-config: cp -r src/tests/integration/config dist/tests/integration/config && cp -r src/tests/integration/nested dist/tests/integration/nested
scripts.pretest: npm run docker:kill && npm run build && npm run copy-test-config && npm run copy-test-package
scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration
scripts.test:integration: wait-on --timeout 20000 http://localhost:8510 http://localhost:8211 && node dist/tests/integration/bootstrap.js && lab --timeout 15000 --verbose -l -S -P spec dist/tests/integration

author: Credit Karma
